hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The tradition, (of the Prophet) is that if someone marries a virgin and he has already a matron wife (with him), then he should stay with the virgin for seven days; and if someone marries a matron (and he has already a virgin wife with him) then he should stay with her for three days

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا تَزَوَّجَ الْبِكْرَ عَلَى الثَّيِّبِ
chapter.eng-name: Marrying a virgin while already having a matron wife
